suites.title: Check the page is displaying correctly on load

tests.title: should have Inside Track as the page title
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check the page is displaying correctly on load should have Inside Track as the page title

tests.title: should display the Inside Track logo
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check the page is displaying correctly on load should display the Inside Track logo
tests.code:
// The image should be visible and have completed loading
_main_page.default.getLogoImg().should('be.visible').and('have.prop', 'complete', true);

tests.title: should display the Github footer
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check the page is displaying correctly on load should display the Github footer

tests.title: should default to empty inputs
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check the page is displaying correctly on load should default to empty inputs

suites.title: Check true odds are calculated and displaying correctly

tests.title: should display green text with accurate values when the odds are favourable
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check true odds are calculated and displaying correctly should display green text with accurate values when the odds are favourable

tests.title: should display red text with accurate values when the odds are unfavourable
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check true odds are calculated and displaying correctly should display red text with accurate values when the odds are unfavourable

suites.title: Check true odds total 100% when summed

tests.title: should show a total of 100% when favourable
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check true odds total 100% when summed should show a total of 100% when favourable

tests.title: should show a total of 100% when not favourable
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track Check true odds total 100% when summed should show a total of 100% when not favourable

tests.title: should display an alert when I click Calculate and no odds have been entered
tests.fullTitle: Negative Testing should display an alert when I click Calculate and no odds have been entered

tests.title: should display an alert when I click Calculate and only some odds have been entered
tests.fullTitle: Negative Testing should display an alert when I click Calculate and only some odds have been entered

tests.title: should display an alert when I click Calculate and invalid odds have been entered
tests.fullTitle: Negative Testing should display an alert when I click Calculate and invalid odds have been entered

suites.title: Test Inside Track using fixtured data
Run checks with unfavourable odds from fixtured data

tests.title: should display red text with accurate values when calculated with unfavourable_1 fixure data
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track using fixtured data Run checks with unfavourable odds from fixtured data should display red text with accurate values when calculated with unfavourable_1 fixure data

tests.title: should display red text with accurate values when calculated with unfavourable_2 fixure data
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track using fixtured data Run checks with unfavourable odds from fixtured data should display red text with accurate values when calculated with unfavourable_2 fixure data

suites.title: Run checks with favourable odds from fixtured data

tests.title: should display green text with accurate values when calculated with favourable_1 fixure data
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track using fixtured data Run checks with favourable odds from fixtured data should display green text with accurate values when calculated with favourable_1 fixure data

tests.title: should display green text with accurate values when calculated with favourable_2 fixure data
tests.fullTitle: Test Inside Track using fixtured data Run checks with favourable odds from fixtured data should display green text with accurate values when calculated with favourable_2 fixure data
